text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Small Number of Amazon Aurora Instances Unavailable>
We are investigating connectivity issues affecting a small number of Amazon Aurora instances in the US-WEST-2 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Small Number of Amazon Aurora Instances Unavailable>
The majority of database instances that experienced connectivity issues in the US-WEST-2 Region have recovered. We are continuing to work to resolve the instances still experiencing connectivity issues.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Small Number of Amazon Aurora Instances Unavailable>
Between 5:14 PM and 7:40 PM PST, we experienced connectivity issues affecting some Amazon Aurora instances in the US-WEST-2 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
